languages.text:
Though you are a fair distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will initiate a concerted attack against your voidship.

traits.locale_text:
You are away from the base and the turrets have you in their sights.
On their turn, they will make a focused attack

Though you are at a distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will make a focused attack against you.

Though you are at a distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will make a focused attack against you.

Though you are a fair distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will initiate a concerted attack against your voidship.

Though you are a fair distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will initiate a concerted attack against your voidship.

Though you are a fair distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will initiate a concerted attack against your voidship.

languages.text:
Вы находитесь на значительном расстоянии от станции, но турели по-прежнему могут в вас стрелять.
На своем ходу они совершат против вас скоординированную атаку.
languages.original_text:
Though you are a fair distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will initiate a concerted attack against your voidship.

traits.locale_text:
Вы находитесь на значительном расстоянии от станции, но турели по-прежнему могут в вас стрелять.
На своем ходу они совершат против вас скоординированную атаку.

Вы находитесь на значительном расстоянии от станции, но турели по-прежнему могут в вас стрелять.
На своем ходу они совершат против вас скоординированную атаку.

languages.text:
Obwohl du weit von der Station entfernt bist, können die Geschütze auf dich feuern.
Sind sie am Zug, leiten sie einen konzertierten Angriff auf dein Raumschiff ein.
languages.original_text:
Though you are a fair distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will initiate a concerted attack against your voidship.

traits.locale_text:
Obwohl du weit von der Station entfernt bist, können die Geschütze auf dich feuern.
Sind sie am Zug, leiten sie einen konzertierten Angriff auf dein Raumschiff ein.

languages.text:
Bien que vous soyez à bonne distance de la station, les tourelles peuvent tout de même vous tirer dessus.
À leur tour, elles lanceront une attaque coordonnée contre votre vaisseau.
languages.original_text:
Though you are a fair distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will initiate a concerted attack against your voidship.

traits.locale_text:
Bien que vous soyez à bonne distance de la station, les tourelles peuvent tout de même vous tirer dessus.
À leur tour, elles lanceront une attaque coordonnée contre votre vaisseau.

Bien que vous soyez à bonne distance de la station, les tourelles peuvent tout de même vous tirer dessus.
À leur tour, elles lanceront une attaque coordonnée contre votre vaisseau.

languages.text:
Aunque te encuentras a cierta distancia de la estación, las torretas aún pueden alcanzarte.
En su turno iniciarán un ataque combinado contra tu nave del vacío.
languages.original_text:
Though you are a fair distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will initiate a concerted attack against your voidship.

traits.locale_text:
Aunque te encuentras a cierta distancia de la estación, las torretas aún pueden alcanzarte.
En su turno iniciarán un ataque combinado contra tu nave del vacío.

languages.text:
ステーションからかなり離れているとはいえ、タレットはまだあなたに発砲できる。
彼らのターンになると、彼らはあなたのヴォイドシップに対して総攻撃を開始する。
languages.original_text:
Though you are a fair distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will initiate a concerted attack against your voidship.

traits.locale_text:
ステーションからかなり離れているとはいえ、タレットはまだあなたに発砲できる。
彼らのターンになると、彼らはあなたのヴォイドシップに対して総攻撃を開始する。

languages.text:
尽管你离星站还有一定距离，但星站的炮台依然可以向你开火。
轮到炮台的回合时，炮台会对你的虚空舰开火。
languages.original_text:
Though you are a fair distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will initiate a concerted attack against your voidship.

traits.locale_text:
尽管你离星站还有一定距离，但星站的炮台依然可以向你开火。
轮到炮台的回合时，炮台会对你的虚空舰开火。

languages.text:
Taretler, istasyondan epey uzakta olmana rağmen yine de sana ateş edebilir.
Turları geldiğinde uçsuz gemine karşı koordineli bir saldırı başlatacaklar.
languages.original_text:
Though you are a fair distance from the station, the turrets can still fire at you.
On their turn, they will initiate a concerted attack against your voidship.
